data.eml:eml: New familial assignments for three species of Neotropical harvestmen based on cladistic analysis (Arachnida: Opiliones: Laniatores)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo, Hara, Marcos Ryotaro (2009): New familial assignments for three species of Neotropical harvestmen based on cladistic analysis (Arachnida: Opiliones: Laniatores). Zootaxa 2241: 33-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190591
